item.content:encoded:
SS01. Getting Started with SIMIT Siemens Simulation Platform with Servo Drive Motion Control (EN)

SS01. Getting Started with SIMIT Siemens Simulation Platform with Servo Drive Motion Control (EN) – YouTube

Terminologies

oscillation -> movement back and forth in a regular rhythm.

resonance -> the quality in a sound of being deep, full, and reverberating.

inertia -> a tendency to do nothing or to remain unchanged.

torque -> Torque is the turning force through a radius

two mass system ->

Full load operating torque vs. break down, pull up and locked rotor torque

Electrical Induction Motors – Torque vs. Speed

SIMATIC VibX (VIBration eXtinction)

in this Load system, consider the momentary of inertia from the motor and load

consider the torque and speed of motor, as well as the oscillation frequency

wordPress Deployment and Sync with Github Step by step how to install wordpress in github to get free hosting – YouTube xampp -> apache, mysql -> create spawningpool_db worldPress -> deploy wp zip @ C:xampphtdocs -> run https://elysium00039.github.io/spawningpool wp config -> xampp db, root, no pw -> apply Themes github ...
Read More
item.content:encoded:
wordPress Deployment and Sync with Github

Step by step how to install wordpress in github to get free hosting – YouTube

xampp -> apache, mysql -> create spawningpool_db

worldPress -> deploy wp zip @ C:xampphtdocs -> run https://elysium00039.github.io/spawningpool

wp config -> xampp db, root, no pw -> apply Themes

github page -> default res public page

wp plugins -> simply static -> github repo, exclude wp-content(uploads) -> C:/xampp/htdocs/spawningpool/

wp plugins -> wp reset

wp plugins -> import markdown

upload and refresh post -> customizing homepage settings

simply static -> re-generate static files -> github desktop -> commit&fetch

next to do:

docker wp in ubuntu

github connect repo
